tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data Catalog.

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Setup the Data Catalog Environment
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to setup your Data Catalog environment.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create a Data Catalog Instance
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to create a new Data Catalog instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Harvest Metadata from Oracle Object Storage
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to harvest technical metadata from Oracle Object Storage.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Provision an Autonomous Database (ADB) Instance
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to provision an ADB instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Clean up Resources Used in the Workshop (Optional)
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to identify and delete the resources that you have created in this workshop.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
